name: Where in the Galaxy is Kremlin San Antonio?
name_original: Where in the Galaxy is Kremlin San Antonio?
description:
Can you follow nefarious criminal mastermind Kremlin San Antonio's trail of theft from planet to planet? Use the clues you find and your Galactipedia of local worlds to pick up her trail!

This twine adventure comes with valuable intel on the planets that Kremlin might visit! This impossibly useful information is included with the game in TXT (text) format! Open OPEN_ME.HTML to view both game and the reference material in a handy split-screen format.

AND / OR: Download the illustrated zine version in PDF format! All this for zero+ dollars! Whatta deal!
